meanings.definition: A type of plant belonging to the Crassulaceae family, typically with fleshy leaves and star-shaped flowers.
meanings.sent1: The sedums in the garden have thick leaves that store water.
meanings.sent2: I planted some sedums in my backyard for their unique appearance.
meanings.sent3: The sedums at the nursery seemed to be gossiping about the other plants.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a sea of sedums, each one a tiny green star.
meanings.sent5: The sedums in the pot looked like little green jewels under the sun.
